string.value: According to #p2020003#, the person that gave him the magical cape is a man over 300 years old. Really? If so, then wouldn't he be none other than #p2020005#? I should go see #p2020005#.

The person who gave #p2020003# the cape was indeed #p2020005#. The one #p2020003# had turned out to be #t1102109#, the cape he made to combat the cold of #m211000000# when he went there to study magic. After asking for the cape, he asked me to get him some items so he can make another one for me.

#i4021000# #t4021000# #b#c4021000##k / 4 
#i4006000# #t4006000# #b#c4006000##k / 2 
#i4000087# #t4000087# #b#c4000087##k / 40 
#i4000051# #t4000051# #b#c4000051##k / 2

I brought all the materials back to #p2020005#, and in return, he gave me #t1102109#, a magic-laced cape designed to combat even the toughest weather. Now I feel like I can totally hunt at #m211000000# now!
300년을 했지만 아직도 마법의 연구는 끝이 없구나... 응? 자네는 누군가? #p2020003#의 망토를 아냐고? #p2020003#... #p2020003#라... 아, 예전에 #m211000000# 앞에서 추위로 꼼짝도 못하던 그 청년 말이로군. 온화한 망토라면 준 게 맞네.
#m211000000#에 마법 연구를 하러 왔는데 너무 추워서 견딜 수가 있어야지. 그래서 만들었는데, 300년이나 지내다 보니 이제는 추위를 견딜 수가 있게 되어서 그 청년에게 주었지. 응? 자네에게도 달라고? 이런... 망토는 그거 하나밖에 없었는데 어떻게 한다? 다시 만들려면 재료가 있어야 하는데 구할 수 있겠는가?
그렇다면 망토를 만들 수 있도록 #t4021000# 4개와 #t4006000# 2개, #t4000087# 50개, #t4000051# 20개를 구해 오게. 그것만 있다면 망토를 만드는 것은 어렵지 않으니, 얼마든지 만들어 주도록 하지.
재료를 구하기 어려운 모양이군. 그렇다면 하는 수 없겠지. 재료를 구할 수 있게 되거든 다시 오게. 그 때 필요한 재료를 알려 주도록 하지.

I've been studying magic for over 300 years, but I see no end to it... Hmmm? Who are you? Do I know about #p2020003#'s cape? #p2020003#... #p2020003#... Ahh, you must be talking about the gentleman in front of #m211000000# who couldn't withstand the harsh cold weather. If it's the cape, then yes it is.

I went to #m211000000# to study magic, but it was unbearably cold, so that's how I got to make the cape. After 300 years, however, my body had gotten much tougher to the point where I can now withstand the cold, so I gave the young man the cape. What? You want one, too? Oh no... that was the only cape I had... what should I do? If you want to make one, we'll have to gather the materials. Can you get them for me?
Okay, now I'll need #b4 #t4021000#s#k, #b2 #t4006000#s#k, #b40 #t4000087#s#k, and #b2 #t4000051#s#k. That should be enough for me to make the cape.
You must be having trouble gathering the materials. That's unfortunate. Let me know when you are ready to get some. I'll tell you the materials required to make the cape.
Did you get all the materials? Then please wait. Once I have the materials in place, it's easy for me to make one.
Alright, THIS is the magic cape that helped me withstand the cold, #t1102109#. With this, cold will never be an issue, even at #m211000000#. Use this well.
I don't think you have all the matierls yet. In order for you to get #t1102109#, get me #b4 #t4021000##k, #b2 #t4006000##k, #b40 #t4000087#s#k, and #b2 #t4000051#s#k.
